1.text: Vihanga received the following note from Saumya. Read it and write a reply using the given phrases.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='vihaŋga'>Vihanga</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> received <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> following <break time='200ms'/> note <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='saumja'>Saumya</phoneme>. <break time='200ms'/> Read <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> write <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> reply <break time='200ms'/> using <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> given <break time='200ms'/> phrases. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: My father will be taking us to the exhibition tomorrow. There will be a circus too. Please join us.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>My <break time='200ms'/> father <break time='200ms'/> will <break time='200ms'/> be <break time='200ms'/> taking <break time='200ms'/> us <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> exhibition <break time='200ms'/> tomorrow. <break time='200ms'/> There <break time='200ms'/> will <break time='200ms'/> be <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> circus <break time='200ms'/> too. <break time='200ms'/> Please <break time='200ms'/> join <break time='200ms'/> us. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: I would like, I'll call you, to join you, when I come, Dear Saumya, Vihanga
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>I <break time='200ms'/> would <break time='200ms'/> like, <break time='200ms'/> I'll <break time='200ms'/> call <break time='200ms'/> you, <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> join <break time='200ms'/> you, <break time='200ms'/> when <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> come, <break time='200ms'/> Dear <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='saumja'>Saumya</phoneme>, <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='vihaŋga'>Vihanga</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Saumya went to see an exhibition with her family during her school holidays. Listen to the announcement on the exhibition and name the places numbered in the following map.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='saumja'>Saumya</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> went <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> see <break time='200ms'/> an <break time='200ms'/> exhibition <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> her <break time='200ms'/> family <break time='200ms'/> during <break time='200ms'/> her <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> holidays. <break time='200ms'/> Listen <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> announcement <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> exhibition <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> name <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> places <break time='200ms'/> numbered <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> following <break time='200ms'/> map. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
